# include<stdio.h>
# include<stdlib.h>
# include<string.h>
# include<iostream>
# include<algorithm>
# include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
        int t,var,n,ans;
        scanf("%d",&t);
        for(var=0;var<t;var++)
        {
                scanf("%d",&n);
                ans = n-1 + (2*n-1)*(2*n-1);
                printf("%d\n",ans);
        
        }

return 0;
}
